attributes.action: Scrap Pay Pal holds on payments for Ebay Sellers.
attributes.additional_details: Pay Pal still take their fee regardless of whether a hold is placed or not. I feel the hold in general is wrongful and eBay seller's should get their money as soon as an item has been paid for through Pay Pal in order to help with postage costs etc,.
attributes.background: Paypal places holds on payments received from selling on eBay. Some of them are placed on new seller accounts however others are placed on eBay accounts that have been registered for many years and have met all of Pay Pal's requirements for NOT placing holds on their payments received.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament is not responsible for operational decisions of private companies such as Pay Pal and eBay.
